Genotype and phenotype are like recipe and taste

Last updated on April 18, 2021

What does evolution select for, genotype or phenotype? The genotype can be likened to a cooking recipe, while the phenotype can be associated with the taste. It’s the taste which gets selected for, but the recipe which is replicated.

Resources

  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Behave_(book)
